) } /* Sets the theme of the page * @param: primeColor - backgroundcolor of header and counter * @param: secondaryColor - backgroundcolor of menu */ function setTheme(primeColor, secondaryColor) { const header = document.getElementById('header'); header.style.backgroundColor = primeColor; const counter = document.getElementById('counter'); counter.style.backgroundColor = primeColor; const menu = document.getElementById('menu'); menu.style.backgroundColor = secondaryColor; } export default Players;
